mapper.select: select count(numIniciativa) from VOTO WHERE numIniciativa=#{num_iniciativa};

select v.id, i.num as i_num, i.descripcion as i_descripcion, i.fechaRegistro as i_fechaRegistro, i.estado as i_estado, i.areaProponente as i_areaProponente,
u.id as i_u_id, u.nombre as i_u_nombre, u.apellido as i_u_apellido, u.email as i_u_email, u.telefono as i_u_telefono, u.tipoUsuario as i_u_tipoUsuario, u.contrasena as i_u_contrasena from VOTO v left join INICIATIVA as i on v.numIniciativa=i.num left join USUARIO as u on i.usuarioProponente=u.id
select count(numIniciativa) from VOTO WHERE numIniciativa=#{num_iniciativa} and idUsuario=#{id_usuario};
mapper.delete: delete from VOTO where idUsuario=#{voto.id_usuario} and numIniciativa=#{voto.num_iniciativa}
